name: Mask/mind
description:
You use one button (Q) to change the mask you wear and you press one button (W) to use the mask’s ability You can also press enter to Toggle fullscreen and backspace to restart. the enemies move depending on which button is pressed. you can only use an attack mask once before you have to cycle to the next

Are you the famous vigilante Mask/Mind who was sentenced to an endless gladiatorial match as a punishment for disobeying his programming. How long can you escape judgment?
